mapper.select: SELECT TX_ID AS txId, TOTAL_CORP AS totalCorp, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, MNG_GUBUN AS mngGubun, OPER_TIME_GUBUN AS operTimeGubun, TERMINAL_CORP_NAME AS terminalCorpName, MODEL_NAME AS modelName, ATM_GUBUN AS atmGubun, OVERHAUL_DATETIME AS overhaulDatetime FROM ATMS_SLA_B0

SELECT TX_ID AS txId, TOTAL_CORP AS totalCorp, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, MNG_GUBUN AS mngGubun, OPER_TIME_GUBUN AS operTimeGubun, TERMINAL_CORP_NAME AS terminalCorpName, MODEL_NAME AS modelName, ATM_GUBUN AS atmGubun, OVERHAUL_DATETIME AS overhaulDatetime FROM ATMS_SLA_B0 WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}, OVERHAUL_DATETIME = #{overhaulDatetime}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_SLA_B0 WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}, OVERHAUL_DATETIME = #{overhaulDatetime}

UPDATE ATMS_SLA_B0 SET TOTAL_CORP = #{totalCorp}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, MNG_GUBUN = #{mngGubun}, OPER_TIME_GUBUN = #{operTimeGubun}, TERMINAL_CORP_NAME = #{terminalCorpName}, MODEL_NAME = #{modelName}, ATM_GUBUN = #{atmGubun} WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}, OVERHAUL_DATETIME = #{overhaulDatetime}

INSERT INTO ATMS_SLA_B0 ( TX_ID, TOTAL_CORP, BRANCH_CODE, BRANCH_NAME, CORNER_CODE, CORNER_NAME, TERMINAL_NO, MNG_GUBUN, OPER_TIME_GUBUN, TERMINAL_CORP_NAME, MODEL_NAME, ATM_GUBUN, OVERHAUL_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #{txId}, #{totalCorp}, #{branchCode}, #{branchName}, #{cornerCode}, #{cornerName}, #{terminalNo}, #{mngGubun}, #{operTimeGubun}, #{terminalCorpName}, #{modelName}, #{atmGubun}, #{overhaulDatetime} )
